room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Room Cleveland in Cleveland
room_description:
A renowned chemist Dr. Bishop has gone insane after losing his son and is out for revenge! He is responsible for bombings all around Cleveland. After the police made a breakthrough by discovering Bishop’s hideout, you and your team will be dispatched to apprehend the suspect!
Dr. Bishop has anticipated your team’s arrival and is leading you into a trap! You and your team must diffuse Dr. Bishop’s bomb within 60 minutes and escape the room!
